item.title: Ubuntu 18.04 全局代理和 Sublime Text 3 设置
item.description: 背景条件 基于Sublime Text 3 官网指南，在Ubuntu 18.04 上进行安装，显示gpg下载错误。 wget -qO - https://download.sublimetext.com/sublimehq-pub.gpg | sudo apt-key add - 把管道命令拆开，单独使用 Curl 命令下载

item.title: Clean White Theme for Hugo
item.description: Clean White Theme for Hugo CleanWhite is a clean, elegant, but fully functional blog theme for Hugo. Here is a live demo site using this theme. It is based on huxblog Jekyll Theme and Clean Blog Jekyll Theme. These two upstream projects have done awesome jobs to create a blog theme, what I’m doing here is porting it to Hugo, of which I like the simplicity and the much faster compiling speed.
Internet company Co-founder/ CEO ex-Partner of a management consulting firm MSc. in Industrial Engineering/ Statistics MSc. in Economics BSc. in Finance
